explains: v. 毁灭（ruin 的过去式及过去分词）

sentences.en: I've ruined every relationship with my possessiveness.
sentences.cn: 我的独占欲每次都毁掉了两人关系。

sentences.en: They've ruined the tourist trade for the next few years.
sentences.cn: 他们已经毁掉了以后几年的旅游生意。

sentences.en: The bad weather ruined our trip.
sentences.cn: 天气恶劣，破坏了我们的旅行。
